projects.title: Podcastr
projects.description: It is an application developed in ReactJS through NLW # 5, where NextJS was integrated to generate static pages, in this application concepts of state, routes, components and contexts were used. It is basically an application for listening to podcasts with a player controller, and displaying details of the podcast.
